name: Workforce Development Program
description: MEDA CAN HELP YOU - Get connected to technology - Learn computer skills - Prepare for job interviews - Connect to job training opportunities - Land a job - Strengthen your personal finances MEDA’s free Workforce Development Program helps San Francisco’s low- and moderate-income job seekers obtain and retain living-wage, long-term employment, complemented by access to opportunities for career growth. All services are provided in English and Spanish at their Mission neighborhood center. Our sector

howToGetIt: Print and fill out our intake and consent forms, in English or Spanish, and bring your completed forms to your workshop or appointment.
